scenarios.description:
5aaaa 5SC
Corner

Easy and consistent confirm from dial against
any character at corner. 5aaaa may be delayed
for more damage.
scenarios.name: Spell confirm corner

scenarios.description:
5aaa 5c 3SC Sword/5SC Crusher
Anywhere

Basic ground spell confirm, 3SC Sword needs
delay against some characters, but you can
always do it to be sure that it will link
against any character. 3SC Laser works too.
scenarios.name: Spell confirm midscreen

scenarios.description:
5aaaa d623b
Corner

Easy way to get limit if you don't have
enough spirit for more optimal combos.
scenarios.name: Dial A starter low spirit corner

scenarios.description:
(j5a lc) 5aaa/f5a 5c d236/a214
Anywhere

The most optimal is getting 5 hits with 5aaa
by delaying 5c, but 4 hits is more consistent.
scenarios.name: Dial A starter

scenarios.description:
j5a j5c j66 j5a j5c
Anywhere

Works against all characters but depends on
position.
scenarios.name: Air j5a starter midscreen 3

scenarios.description:
j5a j8a j5c ja214/jd236/jd623c
Anywhere

Prioritize using a214 ice charge, although it
needs to be at level 2 for air-usage, so
choose other routes available.
scenarios.name: Air j5a starter midscreen

scenarios.description:
5aaa 5b 5c d236b hj9 j2a(3)
Corner

Basic corner combo with j2a ender. Delay 5b
for maximum damage output.
scenarios.name: Dial A starter corner

scenarios.description:
f5a(3) 5c hj9 (j5a) j5c jd623c/ja214c
Anywhere

Basic AUB conversion, j5a may be omitted for
more consistency.
scenarios.name: AUB starter

scenarios.description:
j5a j6b j5c ja214c/jd623b
Anywhere

The most consistent roue but less rewarding.
Do it if you aren't in position to j8a or to
link other combos.
scenarios.name: Air j5a starter midscreen 2

scenarios.description:
j5a j5c j66 (j5a) j8a j2c/j5c
Corner/Near corner

Works near corner if the second j5a is a bit
delayed. j2c is your most optimal ender, but
if the opponent is too low, it will not hit,
needing j5c to cover that angle.
scenarios.name: Air j5a starter (near) corner
